title: Rihanna trolls fans who think she’s releasing new music with latest project
text:
Rihanna is releasing a book (Picture: Rex Features)

Just when we thought Rihanna might bestow upon us some new tunes (we’ve only been waiting 342 years), the mogul has gone and released her latest project.

Unfortunately, we’re still far away from tunes.

But we’ve got a book. Or rather a ‘visual autobiography’. Which is something and we really should stop being so selfish and demanding of our queen, Ri.

Taking to Twitter on Monday, the Rude Boy singer, 31, shared with us she’s spent the past half-decade working on a book of memories.

Over 5 years in the making… happy to finally share this collection of incredible memories. Thanks to all of the photographers & artists that contributed & to @phaidon for working with me to publish my first piece of art in a new industry! pre-order on https://t.co/XIX4c7zPdI 📚 pic.twitter.com/9aXtjzFDIJ — Rihanna (@rihanna) October 7, 2019

Rihanna’s Crop Over carnival outfits are everything (Picture: Mega)

‘Over 5 years in the making… happy to finally share this collection of incredible memories,’ she wrote alongside a clip.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘Thanks to all of the photographers & artists that contributed & to @phaidon for working with me to publish my first piece of art in a new industry!’

Turns out this blessing of a book will feature over 1,000 images of the star, so we have a lot to be thankful for this week.

The hardcover tome, aptly titled Rihanna (is there any other name?), is 504 pages of awesomeness which will, according to Rolling Stone, feature dozens of ‘intimate’ photos of Rihanna’s ‘life as a musician, performer, designer, and entrepreneur’.

She auctioned off the book at her Diamond Ball (Picture: WireImage)

And weight 15 pounds, apparently.

A press statement read: ‘From her childhood in Barbados to her worldwide tours, from quintessential fashion moments to private time with friends and family, the book showcases intimate photographs of her life as a musician, performer, designer, and entrepreneur.’

In some pretty epic behind-the-scenes moments, the star is seen in the studio, on photoshoots and getting ready for her famous carnivale.

Each year we hang out for the mighty Rihanna’s looks as she takes to the streets in various sparkling getups and now we’ve been afforded a look into the backstage moments.

Is…is this better than music?

Er, maybe not, but it’s a nice thing to tide us over, as obviously fans thought she was dropping new bops.

‘I’m so proud of you❤❤ R9 would really be great right now though😭,’ one wrote in the comments section, as another added: ‘AND I THOUGHT THIS IS ABOUT THE ALBUM DAMN MA.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Riri said of the book: ‘I am so excited to share this collection of incredible images. I’m very grateful to the talented photographers and artists who contributed. We’ve been working on the book for over five years and I’m really happy to be able to finally share it with everybody.’

At her recent Diamond Ball, it was reported Cardi B bid on an Ultra Luxury Supreme signed copy of the book, including its 2,000-pound marble pedestal, for $111,000 (£90,000).

There’s only 10 of those.

Rihanna is available to pre-order now.
